price: 36. Kemudian Kami berfirman (kepada keduanya), “Pergilah kamu berdua kepada kaum yang mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami.” Lalu Kami hancurkan mereka dengan sehancur-hancurnya.
arabic: فَقُلۡنَا ٱذۡهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ تَدۡمِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faqul'nā idh'habā ilā al-qawmi alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā fadammarnāhum tadmīran
